title: My main account is "in the process of transferring"
body:
I haven't played in a while and now that i come back i can't seem to login to my main account because it's transferring, even though i did not/could not have requested a transfer.
This would not have been a problem if it actually did transfer, but it seems the process is permanent.
I won't provide my user name as it seems a terrible thing to do on a forum, I just ask for guidance as to what i can do to find a solution to this problem.
P.S.
         The password/name restore forms were not helpful at all.

replies.body: It's scary to come back and find that your account has been transferred, but don't worry we can help!  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), which is a more private venue for our account team to help.  We'll investigate your issue individually and help get you back on track.  Rest easy, and we'll see you there!
